dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notification - vcuplanet.com FA-R292]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 2004 3:41 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notification - vcuplanet.com
FA-R292]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notification - vcuplanet.com
FA-R292
Date:         Mon, 13 Dec 2004 18:28:32 -0800
From:         Richard Kawasaki <richardk@baytsp.com>
To:         <vcuplanet@yahoo.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         feinarts@aol.com



Dear Sirs:

The VCUPlanet subscriber responsible for the post below has linked
images from our client's site without authorization. We strongly urge
that this post be removed and subscribers who post our client's
materials be banned from the forum.

Robert Fein Photography/Fein Arts Internet has authorized BayTSP.com to
act as its agent for copyright infringement notification. The spidering
of the Web has detected infringements on your website as detailed in the
report below. Therefore, this letter is an official notification under
the provisions of section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
to effect removal of the detected infringements listed in the attached
report. The Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic
Works, the Universal Copyright Convention, as well as bilateral treaties
with other countries allow for protection of our client's images even
beyond US borders. The documentation below specifies the exact location
of the infringement. The BayFile ID identifies our images by shoot
number. We hereby request that you immediately remove the offending
material, as specified in RFC 1036, and refrain from using our client's
materials in the future.

BayTSP.com has a good faith belief that use of the material in the
manner complained of in the attached report, is not authorized by Robert
Fein Photography/Fein Arts Internet, its agent, or the law. The
information provided herein is accurate to the best of our knowledge.

BayTSP.com hereby swears under penalty of perjury that BayTSP.com is
authorized to act on behalf of Robert Fein Photography/Fein Arts
Internet for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its
exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.

Please send us a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken
to resolve this matter. Please reference BayTSP Notification ID in your
response.

Sincerely,
Richard Kawasaki
Compliance Manager
BayTSP.com
PO Box 1314
Los Gatos, CA 95031-1314
(408) 341-2300
dmca@baytsp.com

URL:
http://www.vcuplanet.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=14658&&sid=ef251e7ea8d8bac32
1feb3c91591c49f

<http://www.vcuplanet.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=14658&&sid=ef251e7ea8d8bac3
21feb3c91591c49f>
